title: Account questions
body: So I have a new roommate who just moved here from China and we were wondering what if anything could be done about his account, as it stands currently we're just trying to grind a new one back to 30 but that's taking a long time and he has no champs? Anything we can do to speed things up or should we just keep grinding

replies.body: he could also transfere his acc to na
nope, that's the problem, apparently you can't transfer from the asian servers

There's a promotion for email verification that gives you a 4-win IP boost if you complete the process. Our announcement regarding this can be found [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/earn-4-win-ip-boost-verifying-your-email) While this won't help with XP, it will help get more IP quickly to grab some champs or runes.

Outside of that, picking up some XP boosts in the store is the only other thing I can think of that would directly impact the leveling track. It shouldn't take too long, though, as we fairly recently cut the required XP to reach level 30 in half.

Let me know if you have any questions.

thanks, I'll at least try that promotion, the biggest problem at this point is just that he doesn't have his champion pool (or runes, masteries, etc.) also blind pick remains pretty toxic half the time. (on that note did you know ashe, and other ranged champs I assume, can pink ward krugs and then auto from over the wall to avoid afk)
